nplcit.text: NASD rule 2110 and the VA Linux IPO Jan 17, 2005

abstract.p: The present invention provides an auction system that allows IPO sales to be offered in an open and transparent manner, wherein, a certain percentage (up to 100%) of shares in an IPO can be offered to qualified bidders at a "buy now" pre-auction price, set by an issuer and/or underwriter. Investors can be allowed to "bid some shares out of the auction process" and thus guarantee those investors' allocation while also allowing bidders to participate in an open auction for other shares. Shares of stock to be offered in an IPO can include a subset of pre-auction price shares and a subset of auction price shares. The pre-auction price shares are offered to pre-auction bidders at a pre-auction price, and auction shares are generally sold to the highest bidder. Pre-auction sales can serve as a catalyst for generating enthusiasm for an associated IPO auction.

Shares of stock to be offered in an IPO can include a subset of pre-auction price shares and a subset of auction price shares. The pre-auction price shares are offered to pre-auction bidders at a pre-auction price, and auction shares are generally sold to the highest bidder. Pre-auction sales can serve as a catalyst for generating enthusiasm for an associated IPO auction.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: GESTION DE RISQUES D'APPEL PUBLIC A L'EPARGNE

abstract.p: The present invention provides an auction system that allows IPO sales to be offered in an open and transparent manner, wherein, a certain percentage (up to 100%) of shares in an IPO can be offered to qualified bidders at a "buy now" pre-auction price, set by an issuer and/or underwriter. Investors can be allowed to "bid some shares out of the auction process" and thus guarantee those investors' allocation while also allowing bidders to participate in an open auction for other shares. Shares of stock to be offered in an IPO can include a subset of pre-auction price shares and a subset of auction price shares. The pre-auction price shares are offered to pre-auction bidders at a pre-auction price, and auction shares are generally sold to the highest bidder. Pre-auction sales can serve as a catalyst for generating enthusiasm for an associated IPO auction.

L'invention concerne un système de vente aux enchères permettant de proposer des ventes de premier appel public à l'épargne (PAPE) de manière transparente et ouverte, un certain pourcentage (jusqu'à 100%) des actions d'un PAPE pouvant être proposé à des enchérisseurs qualifiés à un prix </= acheter maintenant >/= de pré-vente aux enchères établi par un émetteur et/ou un soumissionnaire. Des investisseurs peuvent être autorisés à </= retirer certaines actions du processus de ventes aux enchères >/= , de sorte à garantir les sommes attribuées desdits investisseurs tout en permettant à des enchérisseurs de participer à une vente aux enchères ouverte pour d'autres actions. Les actions offertes dans le cadre d'un PAPE peuvent inclure un sous-ensemble d'actions à prix de pré-vente aux enchères et un sous-ensemble d'actions à prix de vente aux enchères.

Les actions à prix de pré-vente sont proposées à des enchérisseurs de pré-vente, à un prix de pré-vente, et les actions de ventes aux enchères sont généralement vendues à l'enchérisseur le plus offrant. Les ventes d'actions réalisées avant la vente aux enchères peuvent servir à susciter l'enthousiasme pour une vente aux enchères de PAPE associée.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: GESTION DE RISQUES D'APPEL PUBLIC A L'EPARGNE

abstract.p: An auction system that allows IPO (101) sales to be offered in an open and transparent manner, wherein, a certain percentage up to 100% of shares in an IPO can be offered to qualified bidders (105) at a "buy now" pre-auction price (102) set by an issuer and/or underwriter. Investors can be allowed to "bid some shares out of the auction process" (103) and thus guarantee those investors' allocation while also allowing bidders to participate in an open auction for other shares. Shares of stock to be offered in an IPO can include a subset of pre-auction price shares and a subset of auction price shares. The pre-auction price shares are offered to pre-auction bidders at a pre-auction price, and auction shares are generally sold to the highest bidder.

L'invention concerne un système de vente aux enchères permettant de proposer des ventes de premier appel public à l'épargne (PAPE) de manière transparente et ouverte, un certain pourcentage (jusqu'à 100%) des actions d'un PAPE pouvant être proposé à des enchérisseurs qualifiés à un prix </= acheter maintenant >/= de pré-vente aux enchères établi par un émetteur et/ou un soumissionnaire. Les actions offertes dans le cadre d'un PAPE peuvent inclure un sous-ensemble d'actions à prix de pré-vente aux enchères et un sous-ensemble d'actions à prix de vente aux enchères.

Les actions à prix de pré-vente sont proposées à des enchérisseurs de pré-vente, à un prix de pré-vente, et les actions de ventes aux enchères sont généralement vendues à l'enchérisseur le plus offrant. Les ventes d'actions réalisées avant la vente aux enchères peuvent servir à susciter l'enthousiasme pour une vente aux enchères de PAPE associée.
